about.title: Our Story
about.description: EGEOD (Expert of Geospatial and Earth Observation Data) was born in 2025 from a passion for cutting-edge technologies and the potential of big data and geospatial data to transform the world.
about.mission: Our mission is to democratize access to geospatial data and transform it into concrete solutions to address tomorrow's environmental and societal challenges.

team.description: A team of experts passionate about data and innovation

values.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in every project and deliverable
values.engagementDesc: We are dedicated to our clients' success
values.collaborationDesc: We work closely with our clients and partners

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At EGEOD, we believe in a world where geospatial data serves sustainable development and territorial intelligence.
vision.future: Through our expertise and innovations, we contribute to building a future where space technology and Earth observation are essential levers for decision-making and preserving our planet.
